title: 08/25/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/25/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP Talks to former NFL QB and ESPN Monday Night Football Analyst Brian Griese about the Saints decision at QB. What's Coach Payton waiting for to announce a starter? College Football Analyst Kirk Herbstriet joins us to help make sense of the purpose of the alliance between the ACC, Big Ten, and Pac 12. And DP and the guys do a Nicolas Cage movie draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
